name: Spacer (Master_WIzard)
description:
This game is a finished but will get updates so please wait for them.

Tell me your high score in the comments below.

(Reminder: This is still a work in progress game if you see any bugs or have ideas please tell me in the comments below.)

(Another Reminder: If you say I copied from Heart Beast its because I did but that is just for the space ship part and I will be making it more original)

Make sure to check out my YouTube channel

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2Q9ZKXjzamvHYcaB...

Music by:

Benjamin Anderson Brother

If you can't see the Download button download the itch.io app and download it from there.
